## HasManyThroughRepository.find() method

Find target model instance(s)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
find(filter?: Filter<Target>, options?: Options & {
        throughOptions?: Options;
    }): Promise<Target[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  filter | [Filter](./filter.filter.md)<!-- -->&lt;Target&gt; | A filter object for where, order, limit, etc. |
|  options | [Options](./repository.options.md) &amp; { throughOptions?: [Options](./repository.options.md)<!-- -->; } | Options for the operation |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Target\[\]&gt;

A promise which resolves with the found target instance(s)
